title: Breaking: NVIDIA B100 spotted in the wild!
content: Just saw the first B100 rack at the OCP summit. The cooling solution is insane. #NVIDIA #Blackwell #AI

title: Rumor: Apple cutting Vision Pro orders again
content: Supply chain sources saying Apple has cut micro-OLED orders by another 20%. Not looking good for spatial computing adoption. #Apple #VisionPro

title: TSMC N3E yields hitting 85%??
content: Hearing crazy numbers for N3E yields. If true, A19 is going to be a beast. #TSMC #AppleSilicon
